subject: The most powerful wealth strategy I've ever known
body:
===============================================================
   We love giving our InvestorPlace.com members benefits like 
               access to this timely message.  

    In order to ensure you keep receiving special alerts 
   and offers like this one, please take a moment to click 
         the link in this message to reconfirm that 
     this is the email address where you want to receive 
               emails from InvestorPlace.com.
===============================================================


May 2, 2007

Fellow Investor,

I have a short video for you to watch that could literally 
change your life.

This video details the most powerful wealth strategy I've 
ever known.  As you'll see, it literally saved a friend of 
mine, and her three children, from financial ruin.

People all over America are using this strategy to triple 
their retirement income; fund extensive travel; pay the costs 
of college education for their children or grandchildren; and 
afford quality long-term care for their parents.

Best of all, these people - people who I'm sure are like you 
in many ways - are building a rock-solid fortress of wealth 
and a rich cash flow to last the entire lives.

So if you need income...

If you're approaching retirement...

Or if you simply want to invest some of your portfolio in 
something more certain in this uncertain world, then I urge 
you to watch this short video presentation.

It will only take 2 minutes.  But it tells a tremendously 
empowering story of how anyone can become cash-rich, 
with all the income you'll ever need.

Click here to view it now: 
http://confirm.investorplace.com/c/conf?CRCWSIMPWS-3317975-8CK123-8CK123

Sincerely,

Bryan Perry
ChangeWave's 25% Cash Machine



---------------------------------------------------------
